abstract: For the better part of a decade, the accuracy rate for extra points has hovered around 99 percent, making the kick itself seem equal parts automatic and superfluous.
snippet: For the better part of a decade, the accuracy rate for extra points has hovered around 99 percent, making the kick itself seem equal parts automatic and superfluous.
lead_paragraph: The first four weeks of the N.F.L. season have been filled with surprises, but there has been one constant: the extra point.

headline.main: Extra Point Is Almost Always Good; Is That a Good Thing?
